data.eml:eml: Valdesiana curiosa: a remarkable new genus and species of Clivinematini (Hemiptera: Miridae: Deraeocorinae) from Argentina, and a key to Argentinean genera and species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carpintero, Diego Leonardo, Dellapé, Pablo Matías, Cheli, German (2008): Valdesiana curiosa: a remarkable new genus and species of Clivinematini (Hemiptera: Miridae: Deraeocorinae) from Argentina, and a key to Argentinean genera and species. Zootaxa 1672: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180207
